comments.content:
Could someone tell me the general style of this font?

Western?  
Wood?

It doesn't look like anyone knows this one, so I want to see if I can at least get some direction.

Thanks!

There are several terms for this style when you search for it: Tuscan, Circus, Western, 1800s. Font Mesa has the best collection of these styles, I think.

- Mike Yanega
